member.name: OLECMDTEXT
member.summary: Specifies a text name or status string for a single command identifier.

member.name: OLECMDTEXT.cmdtextf
member.summary: A value from the enumeration describing whether the rgwz member contains a command name or status text.

member.name: OLECMDTEXT.cwActual
member.summary: The number of characters actually written into the rgwz buffer before returns.

member.name: OLECMDTEXT.cwBuf
member.summary: The number of elements in the rgwz array.

member.name: OLECMDTEXT.rgwz
member.summary: A caller-allocated array of wide characters to receive the command name or status text.
